EmailTemplate.name: AOG Order Acknowledgement (Auto)-Portal
EmailTemplate.subject: AOG Order Acknowledgment {!Case.CaseNumber}, {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
AOG Order Acknowledgment
Thank you for contacting Honeywell Aerospace AOG Customer Support. We have received your request and have started working to identify a solution. To help with tracking of your request, here is your unique tracking number: {!Case.CaseNumber}.
This is in reference to your recent MyAerospace order for PO {!Case.Customer_PO_RO_WONumber__c}.
If you have any questions, please reply to this email or you can call us at 1-800-601-3099 (US/Canada) or at 1-602-365-3099 (International), choosing option 4 when prompted.
Thank you for contacting Honeywell AOG support.
Honeywell AOG Team Customer & Product Support Web: https://aerospace.honeywell.com Phone: 1-800-601-3099 (US/Canada), option #4 Phone: 1-602-365-3099 (International), option #4
